data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Decae, Arthur, Pantini, Paolo, Isaia, Marco (2015): A new species-complex within the trapdoor spider genus Nemesia Audouin 1826 distributed in northern and central Italy, with descriptions of three new species (Araneae, Mygalomorphae, Nemesiidae). Zootaxa 4059 (3): 525-540, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4059.3.5
